info.name: Gmail — Hide add-ons sidebar buttons
info.description: Hides the buttons on the right that open add-ons in the side bar. The buttons will be condensed into a single button, and will expand on hover.
info.additionalInfo:
• 5 June, 2018
    • Fixed the bar being on top of the email list even when collapsed/hidden.
